topic.title: Chapter Three
topic.shortdesc: The Ugly Duckling can't take it anymore.

body.p: One evening, after yet another round of teasing, the ugly duckling decided he could no longer bear the pain of rejection. With a heavy heart, he spread his wings and waddled away from the farm, determined to find a place where he could belong.

One evening, after yet another round of getting his tail feathers beat, the ugly duckling decided he could no longer bear the pain. With a heavy heart, he spread his wings and waddled away from the farm, determined to find a place where he could belong.
He walked through fields and forests, meeting various animals along the way. Some ignored him, while others laughed at his appearance.
He walked through fields and forests, meeting various animals along the way. Some ignored him, while others laughed at his appearance, tripped him, or beat him up.
Despite the bullying he faced, the ugly duckling pressed on. He knew that somewhere in this world, there was acceptance.
